name: element-fm
description: Element Docs is the documentation site for Element, a Matrix-based messaging client. It contains guides on deployment, configuration, security, and integrations for admins running Element in self-hosted or enterprise environments.
features: Deployment Guides: Comprehensive setup instructions for Element. Easy implementation.
Configuration Help: Detailed settings and options documentation. Optimize your setup.
Security Best Practices: Guidelines for secure messaging deployment. Protected communications.
Integration Examples: Connect Element with other services. Extended functionality.
Admin Resources: Tools and tips for managing Element servers. Efficient administration.
Self-Hosted Focus: Documentation tailored for self-hosting. Complete control guidance.
